Designing Shopify Multichannel

This post is filed under shopify • Published January 2016

In early 2015 I moved to the Multichannel team at Shopify working on the Product Design of Shopify's Multichannel strategy. The next 12 months were a blur of quickly shipping products and the rapid growth of the Product Design team in Toronto.

What's Shopify Multichannel?

Commerce shouldn't just exist in the store you walk into or the branded website you pull up. These are only two places in which you can encounter customers however Shopify builds merchants the tools to sell everywhere. Merchants should be where their customers are.

When Multichannel Shopify was announced, Shopify already came with three sales channels: Online store, POS and Buy Buttons. We spent the next nine months building out more sales channels.

Selling on Facebook

The first cycles of the Facebook sales channel enabled merchants to post their products to their Facebook business page and users would see "Buy" call-to-action buttons. Users would never have to leave Facebook to buy merchant products.
